meanings.definition: A Japanese sword with a curved, single-edged blade.
meanings.sent1: The warrior wielded his katana skillfully in battle.
meanings.sent2: Samurai often carry katanas as a symbol of their honor.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully used a katana to slice through the vegetables.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp as a katana, cutting through the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming katana reflected the sunlight, dazzling all who beheld it.

meanings.sent1: Legends speak of warriors who possessed multiple katanas.
meanings.sent2: In the display case, there were various katanas from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The katanas in the collection seemed to whisper stories of battles past.
meanings.sent4: The katanas lined up on the wall looked like a row of silent sentinels.
meanings.sent5: The room was filled with the glint of polished katanas, a sight to behold.
